name: Travel Coach: Europe 2
overview: Universal dictionary for German, English, Dutch, Greek, Turkish - all language combinations possible Altogether over 40,000 keywords and over 400,000 diffracted word forms in the basic and travel vocabulary Over 300 phrases in 25 categories such as greetings and wishes, first contact or time and weather to listen, practice and recitation Detailed language trainer with 10 different forms of exercises such as cloze, dictation and listening comprehension to learn and expand the basic vocabulary Illustrated travel guide with country information, addresses, customs and practical information for Germany, England, the Netherlands, Turkey and Greece
